urls.description: Indian untouchables - Dalits - and the lower caste people suffered a lot over millennia. But why was there no revolution by them? Does the middle class concept that offers satisfaction to the middle class people despite not really being happy with the upper class explain it? Our women empowering site that airs Women's power: Its Past, Its Present, Its Future: Femocracy brings you this article that possibly for the first time asks why there was no revolution in India by the lower casts and offers the answer too.
urls.title: Despite Millennia of Oppression, Why Did Not The Lower Caste And The Untouchables Revolt Against The Indian Upper Caste?
